name: Reform (Myriadim)
description:
Reform is a still-in-the-making robot dating simulator, where you play as a newly hired Reformation Officer, who is assigned to a robot who has committed crimes, in order to help them stay out of jail! You duties include keeping them happy, befriending them, and convincing them to stay out of trouble by any means necessary.


Meet Bruiser, the first available client. They're strong and a little hard headed, a tough case for sure, but they're willing to change for the better!

Reform features:

  • Pick your own pronouns
  • Pick your partner's pronouns
  • Multiple endings
  • Tough fighter robots!
  • Racer robots!
  • Robots who like humans a little bit too much

And more to come as the game develops!

Bruiser's route is complete and ready to play! Spark, the second client, will have her route released eventually. It is currently available for play, but it is incomplete and untested at the moment! Everything is still very basic and in its early stages, but the story is there.
